name: DOUBLE STRENGTH Jinger & Turmeric -  700ml
description: Experience the Wellness Benefits of Our Ginger and Turmeric Concentrate Our new double-strength turmeric and ginger drink is a potent blend, packed with 26% turmeric and 47% ginger‚Äîdouble the concentration of our original recipe. This powerful formulation offers enhanced natural support for your immune system, inflammation response, and overall vitality. Key Ingredients & Benefits:Turmeric (26%): A well-known source of curcumin, turmeric is celebrated for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. Curcumin helps to reduce inflammation in the body, support joint health, and contribute to cardiovascular and cognitive wellness.Ginger (47%): Rich in gingerol, ginger offers anti-nausea, anti-inflammatory, and digestive support. It‚Äôs widely recognised for its ability to improve circulation, boost immunity, and provide natural relief from indigestion and gastrointestinal discomfort. Uncompromising Strength & PurityWith twice the potency of our original blend, this drink is designed for those who seek maximum impact from natural ingredients. Whether you‚Äôre focused on reducing inflammation, boosting digestion, or supporting overall health, our double-strength formula delivers a more intense shot of nature‚Äôs most effective natural ingredients. Available in Two Formulations:Sugar: For a hint of sweetness that complements the bold spice of ginger and the earthiness of turmeric.No Added Sugar: For those who prefer a pure, unsweetened experience, retaining all the natural benefits without any added sugars. Available in 700ml and 1L bottles, this double-strength turmeric and ginger shot is perfect for daily use, either as a standalone health booster or incorporated into smoothies, juices, or wellness drinks. Unlock the daily benefits of ginger and turmeric with our cold-pressed liquid superfood. Packed with essential vitamins, gingerol, and curcumin renowned for their anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties, this elixir is your key to better health. Our Ginger and Turmeric concentrate is a daily dose of vitality, brimming with the natural goodness of gingerol and curcumin, renowned for their powerful anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties. Embrace the daily advantages of ginger and turmeric, known to: Enhance Digestion: Promotes healthy digestion and gut comfort. Combat Inflammation: helps lower inflammation, especially beneficial for arthritis and autoimmune disease. Manage Cholesterol: Supports heart health by regulating cholesterol levels. Enjoy in Three Ways: Detox and Hydrate: Mix 20-30ml in water, add fresh mint and a slice of lemon for a refreshing detox and super hydration. Refreshing Sip: Combine 20ml with tonic water, soda water, or sparkling water, on the rocks or off, for a delightful beverage. Boost Immunity: Take 20-30ml neat when facing a hangover, indigestion, or feeling under the weather to strengthen your immune system. With a shelf life of up to 60 days after opening, store in the fridge for lasting freshness. Ingredients: Water, 47% Ginger*, 26% Turmeric*, Lemon*, Lime*, 10% Cane Sugar*, Black Pepper*, Herbs and Spices* (*Organic Origin)

Tautila Tinto Full Bodied wine 0%Se√±orio de la Tautila Tinto non-alcoholic red wine is produced by Se√±or√≠o de la Tautila in Spain. The wine has a ripe, cherry colour and exhibits pleasant, fruity aromas behind the hints of wood barrels. The wine is voluminous in the mouth and has a persistent structure with personality. Best paired with meats, roasts and savoury appetizers.This wine is produced through a method known as vacuum distillation at low temperature, the most traditional and least aggressive method of dealcoholisation. Through this sophisticated method, it is processed without temperature aggression or pressure. The wine is previously fermented in stainless steel tanks under strictly controlled conditions. Guiltless Wines Cabernet Sauvignon - A sweet, blackberry fruit aroma with hints of cabernet variety, harmonized by subtle hints of oak A sweet, drink with slightly distinguishable tannin and a characteristic acidity that makes it light and agreeable. As with the nose, fruit flavours are noted, integrated through the enveloping and pleasant tannic structure of the grapes. The tannins are soft without spikes and heighten the passage through the mouth. It has a fruity retronasal and a medium, pleasant aftertaste, in which the same aromas persist as in the nose.

name: Feragaia Whiskey - ABV 0% | 700 ML
description: 0.0% ABVTHE ORIGINAL FREE SPIRIT FERAGAIA is the moment you step off the path. A balanced blend of wild flavours. A complexity that invites you to pause. To reconnect. To appreciate the people around you and the ground beneath your feet. Distilled to be different. Here‚Äôs to your original free spirit.The original free spirit combines authentic originality with the rich distilling heritage of Scotland. Made from 14 land & sea botanicals that were carefully identified for their flavour profiles and wild earth properties. Its refreshing depth of flavour is a layered journey through wild earth.From the land, the freshness of lemon verbena and blackcurrant leaf brings with it a resilience for the ‚Äòalways on‚Äô modern age. From the sea, nutrient rich Sugar Kelp gives body and breadth whilst promoting inner renewal. And finally, a long finish from spiced botanicals like pink peppercorn, brings a sense of grounding and calm.Feragaia was founded in 2019 by Jamie Wild & Bill Garnock with a vision to challenge the apologetic nature of alcohol-free drinks, with a truly confident alcohol-free spirit that isn‚Äôt trying to mimic anything and stands as a drink in it‚Äôs own right.As part of their three-year evolution Feragaia have recently opened their very own distillery, the first working alcohol-free distillery in Scotland, and are relaunching with a refreshed brand and bottle, as well as extending their offering by stepping into the ready to drink market with pre-mixed cans, allowing Feragaia to be able to meet even more drinking moments. IngredientsBotanical Distillates, Water, Vegetable Glycerine (rapeseed), Flavour Extracts: Cayenne Pepper, Blackcurrant leaf, Kaffir Lime, Chamomile, Lemon Verbena, Ancho Chile, Bay Leaf, Apple, Hibiscus.Preservative: Potassium Sorbate. Natural acid: Citric, Tartaric, Malic. name: French Dry Sparkling Chardonnay ABV 0% 750ml
description: This is the ideal alternative to Champagne at celebrations for those who want a booze-free alternative Pale yellow colour with shine and glint. Delicate foam with aromas of tropical fruits, peaches, lychee and flowers. Fruit forward on the palate balanced by a clean freshness. Grapes are harvested at night to take advantage of the lower temperatures when sugar levels are most stable. Traditional winemaking and production methods are then performed before the alcohol is gently removed, maintaining the wonderful body and freshness of premium French wine. The effervescent is then produced and the wine is bottled in a unique package that reflects the finesse of its bubbles. Tasting notes: Delicate foam with aromas of tropical fruits, peaches, lychee and flowers. Fruit forward on the palate balanced by a clean freshness. Alcohol: 0.0% vol. Grape Variety: Chardonnay Nutrition Kcal 18/100ml Storage temperature: Below 10 Celsius Serving temperature: 6 to 8 Celsius Storage: 6 to 8 Celsius Terroir: Origin - Blend of diverse wines from the South of France.Soil - Great diversity.Climate - Mediterranean. Why this wine is an excellent choice: The 'Muscat' notes add a light sweetness to the wine, perfect for summer BBQs. This is a nice match with appetizers or desserts.3 words to resume this wine:Wellness, health and diet. Harvest is made overnight to take advantage of the lowest temperatures (between 2 to 6 am). The slow and gentle press followed by a cold temperature fermentation in stainless steel tank (between 15 to 18¬∞). Second fermentation with ageing on fine less during 2 months. 100% Alcohol-Free | Non-Alcoholic Wine

name: French Organic Cabernet-Sauvignon ABV 0%
description: Tasting notes √îPIA Cabernet Sauvignon is an organic, alcohol-free drink with a deep ruby red hue. The nose exudes characteristic aromas of the varietal such as jammy fruits, blackcurrant, morello cherry, vanilla and clove. The palate is dominated by fruity aromas and underpinned by a tannic structure. Its spicy, peppery notes give it warmth and a long, lingering finish. Making process Pre-fermentation maceration at warm temperature of around 75¬∞C accelerates the extraction of colour components and tannins in the grapes. The ageing process involves the infusion of organic grape pips and French oak in order to ensure excellent aromatic complexity. 100% Alcohol Free | Non Alcoholic Wine

name: French Organic Chardonnay ABV0%
description: This organic alcohol free chardonnay is pale yellow with green hues, the nose discloses aromas of acacia and peach, combined with a touch of citrus and vanilla. The palate is fresh and lively. Pierre Chavin was formed by Mathilde Boulachin and Fabien Gross, who combined their skills for winemaking and marketing to create a traditional yet innovative estate. They want to bring the joys of wine to everyone, shedding the elitist image and pricing. Grapes are sourced from the finest organic vineyards and blended to create superb wines at excellent prices. They are pushing the boundaries of traditional winemaking by producing No Added Sulphur wines and Alcohol Free wines in addition to organic and vegan-suitable wines. They are also using the latest eco-friendly technologies such as lightweight bottles, wood-free paper labels and corks made from sustainable sugar cane. Free from added sulphur, wheat, dairy, GMO ingredients, artificial flavours, artificial colours and artificial preservatives. Suitable for vegans and vegetarians. Glass and cardboard packaging are recyclable.Made in France.Screw cap 6 x 750ml

description: Non-Alcoholic ABV 0% 750ml With its alluring blush shade and bubbles that lightly dance in champagne flutes, the Pierre Zero Sparkling Rose is a must-have beverage for any grand occasion. Grapes are harvested at night to take advantage of the lower temperatures, when sugar levels are most stable. Traditional wine making and production methods are then performed before the alcohol is gently removed, maintaining the wonderful body and freshness of a premium French wine. The effervescent is then produced and the wine is bottled in a unique package that reflects the finesse of its bubbles. Tasting notes: Its aromas are nothing short of beautiful, with floral, red berry and Muscat grape notes. name: Garlic and Ginger Concentrate  500ML
description: Garlic and Ginger - Discover the harmonious blend of two extraordinary ingredients, Garlic and Ginger, meticulously crafted into a tonic to help reduce cholesterol levels Cardiovascular Support: Enhance your heart health with every sip. Garlic is known to help maintain healthy blood pressure levels, while ginger supports circulation and reduces the risk of heart-related issues, making this drink an excellent choice for those concerned with cardiovascular wellness. We have used organic Ginger & Garlic, cayenne pepper and organic forest honey with apple cider vinegar. How to drink. Dilute 20ml in water take daily preferably every morning. You can take a shot if your brave. I would recommend you dilute 30ml of water add 20ml Garlik and drink with a straw, followed by a shot of turmeric! This drink must be stored in the fridge shake well before use.
